00043 class OptionsTest extends UnitTestCase {

00045   function OptionsTest() {
00046     $this->UnitTestCase();
00047   }
00048 
00049   //
00050   // Basic Testing of Nat, rdr and binat statements
00051   //
00052   function test_tcp_timeouts() {
00053     $pfw = new pfw();
00054     $pfw->parseRulebase('set timeout { tcp.first 120, tcp.opening 30, tcp.established 86400, tcp.closing 900, tcp.finwait 45, tcp.closed 90 }');
00055     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'set timeout { tcp.first 120, tcp.opening 30, tcp.established 86400, tcp.closing 900, tcp.finwait 45, tcp.closed 90 }');
00056   }
00057 
00058   function test_udp_timeouts() {
00059     $pfw = new pfw();
00060     $pfw->parseRulebase('set timeout { udp.first 60, udp.single 30, udp.multiple 60 }');
00061     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'set timeout { udp.first 60, udp.single 30, udp.multiple 60 }');
00062   }
00063 
00064   function test_icmp_timeouts() {
00065     $pfw = new pfw();
00066     $pfw->parseRulebase('set timeout { icmp.first 20, icmp.error 10 }');
00067     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'set timeout { icmp.first 20, icmp.error 10 }');
00068   }
00069
